channel.title: [Crash] Flashlight aimed at certain locations
channel.description: Whenever I aim my flashlight at certain areas of the map(s) (always the same ones) the game will instantly freeze and crash to desktop. The windows crash report always mentions an error unloading datacache.dll Attached is the MDMP Rig: GTX 670 - latest drivers / non beta AMD 960T OC'ed to 4.0ghz 8GB ram - DDR3 Motherboard: Gigabyte 990FXA-UD3 hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T7_10_30C0.mdmp (98.1 KB)

item.title: [Crash] Flashlight aimed at certain locations
